name: Can U Dig It!
description:
How many ancient artifacts can you dig up in this addictive puzzle game? Use strategic thinking to collect rare items in this unique, math-based challenge that’ll have you asking: Can I Dig It?

Dig-It! Games presents CanUDigIt!, an addictive dig-em-up journey that teams players up with Team Q, a group of adventurous archaeologists, as they search for rare artifacts from exotic excavation sites. Use logic and strategic thinking to build up your artifact collection of authentic ancient Maya tools, weapons, jewelry, and more. Compare your high scores and achievements with friends across the world through Game Center.

App Features
• Explore exotic excavation sites in the Maya in Central America
• Test your wit with challenging puzzles
• 2 different play modes: are you a Planner or a Digger?
• Comprehensive Artifact Collection offers historically accurate information on more than 40 genuine ancient Maya objects
